Hi there. You might be following the Cambridge O Level Biology Syllabus for Paper 5090.  Even so, the topic "kidney dialysis" is one of the topics that have been removed from the syllabus.  If you are sitting for the Biology Syllabus for Paper 5090, please refer to this link: https://www.cambridgeinternational.org/Images/595450-2023-2025-syllabus.pdf  If you do a quick search like "topics removed", you can browse the rest of the topics that are no longer relevant.  Please note that our videos follow the Cambridge IGCSE Biology Paper 0610 syllabus. Here's a link to the details of that syllabus: https://www.cambridgeinternational.org/Images/595426-2023-2025-syllabus.pdf
